title: Identify socially optimal Q and tax from graph

content.question: The socially optimal quantity and the per-unit tax that will achieve the socially optimal quantity are which of the following?

choices.label: Socially Optimal Quantity Per-Unit Tax Q1 P4 - P2
Socially Optimal Quantity Per-Unit Tax Q2 P3 - P2
Socially Optimal Quantity Per-Unit Tax Q3 P4 - P2
Socially Optimal Quantity Per-Unit Tax Q2 P3 - P1
Socially Optimal Quantity Per-Unit Tax Q3 P3 - P2

content.answer: Socially Optimal Quantity Per-Unit Tax Q2 P3 - P1

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
